message: Let's be fair and split the money almost equally, accounting for the slight inflation disadvantage I have.
I think it's fair to account for the inflation difference, but I'd prefer a larger share since I'm not losing any value.
Bob, this is my final offer.  A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  If you reject this, I'm unlikely to accept anything less favorable in future rounds as the inflation will only hurt me more.
